meanings.definition: A booklet containing the texts for the celebration of Mass.
meanings.sent1: During Mass, the priest read from the missalette.
meanings.sent2: The missalette helped the church members follow along with the service.
meanings.sent3: The missalette accidentally fell off the pew and caused a small commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her missalette was like a map guiding her through the Mass.
meanings.sent5: The colorful missalette cover caught the eye of the young girl.

meanings.definition: A small book containing the prayers and readings for Mass.
meanings.sent1: The missalette contained all the prayers needed for the service.
meanings.sent2: She always carried her missalette to church to read the daily readings.
meanings.sent3: The missalette seemed to whisper the prayers as she flipped through its pages.
meanings.sent4: His worn-out missalette held the stories of faith close to his heart.
meanings.sent5: The missalette was a treasure trove of spiritual guidance for her.
